itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway talk Trump’s latest fraud claims (Dan and Ross don’t buy it without evidence), Dan thinks the Feds’ handling of the Pennsylvania USPS worker is suspect, Rashida Tlaib earns the “Get F**ked of the Week”, Jeffrey Toobin’s penis finally does him in, plus Biden’s COVID plans post-inauguration and Pfizer’s weird vaccine behavior.
